name: Goating Up
description:
Play as the queen of goats during her quest to save the soul of a recently deceased Dalai lama. To succeed she must climb a difficult mountain.

Walking up the mountain will be no easy task and completing the game might require dedication. We hope you have fun with this wonky and silly game.

Controls:

The goats four legs are each bound to one of the number keys 1, 2, 3 or 4. To control the legs press down one or multiple keys. The legs connected to the key you press will follow your cursor. Use the Esc key to pause the game. Through the pause meny you can resume playing, restart, ask for help or quit.

Credits:

Brick Wall Team: Theo Hübner Sallis, Benjamin Svensson, Mark Laguitan', Rickard Burtus Sevemar, Christian Lundgren, Aulden Carter, Gopal Alvarez

Special thanks to Leo Wognum.
